bibl.title: Report on the Second Season of the Egyptian-Swiss Joint Mission at the Late Roman Fort at Nag el-Hagar (Upper Egypt). Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The Late Roman Fort at Nag el-Hagar was constructed around 300 AD or during the first half of the fourth century. - Second Season (February / March 2006). - The Cesium Magnetometry (by Jörg FASSBINDER). - The Topographical Survey (by Manfred STEPHANI). - The Pottery Survey and Work on Late Roman Pottery. - Excavations in the southeast area of the fort (trenches 1-4). - Architectural documentation, restoration and preservation (by Alexander VON KIENLIN).
bibl.seg: EL-BIALY Mohamed and Michael MACKENSEN, Report on the Second Season of the Egyptian-Swiss Joint Mission at the Late Roman Fort at Nag el-Hagar (Upper Egypt). Avec résumé en anglais.

The Late Roman Fort at Nag el-Hagar was constructed around 300 AD or during the first half of the fourth century. - Second Season (February / March 2006). - The Cesium Magnetometry (by Jörg FASSBINDER). - The Topographical Survey (by Manfred STEPHANI). - The Pottery Survey and Work on Late Roman Pottery. - Excavations in the southeast area of the fort (trenches 1-4). - Architectural documentation, restoration and preservation (by Alexander VON KIENLIN).
el-Bialy Mackensen Fassbinder Stephani von Kienlin
